name: Cusano - MC Bundle - Churchill
additionalNotes: Coming from the legendary Davidoff Company, it should come as no surprise that the Cusano MC Bundle, a value-priced premium cigar, rivals the quality and taste of many high-end brands on the market today. Handmade in Davidoff’s famous factory in the Dominican Republic, the MC Bundle cigars feature a silky golden brown Connecticut Shade wrapper over the finest aged Dominican binder and filler tobaccos. Full bodied and brimming with bold yet creamy textured notes of cocoa, cedar, and dark spice.
